title: What are the different techniques and exercises used in hypnotherapy and self-hypnosis?
first_phrase: In this text, the author discusses various techniques and exercises related to hypnotherapy, self-hypnosis, and magnetism. The last 200 tokens cover topics such as the four meditations (earth, fire, water, and air), method for weight loss, and strong somnambulism induction. The author also introduces the concept of enneagram, a personality analysis tool that identifies nine types of people based on their self-identifications. The author emphasizes the importance of understanding a person's preferences and adapting the approach accordingly, as it can change during the course of interactions. The text also includes demonstrations of various techniques, including the mirror exercise of de-identification, which aims to put away false personalities that parasitize us.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the world of hypnosis is vast and ancient, present in every tradition. To induce someone into deep hypnosis, it's essential to understand their preferences and adapt to their personality. The enneagram is a map of compulsions, a representation of different personalities around a circle, where the center is our essence. To access our inner sense, we can increase our sensitivity through clairvoyance exercises. Finally, Indian self-hypnosis allows us to realize something in the universe by working on the three levels of our body and blowing our desires into the universe. Practice these techniques regularly to enhance your behavior and enjoy a better life.
